Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.closeable

Supports objects with dependencies on 1 or more reactors (beta).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Closeable
    An object that depends on 1 or more reactors, so that when a reactor is closed the object is also closed.
    CloseableImpl
    The interface of the code that actually implements closeable.

Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.closeable Description

Supports objects with dependencies on 1 or more reactors (beta).
